section.title: open items complete range of Open Items
section.para: To view A/R open items, select the "Open Items" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying A/R open items, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: A/R open items having due dates on and after this date will be displayed.
A/R open items having due dates on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists A/R open items, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
